# 3 Frases icÃ³nicas de dichas marcas
> "Just Do It", Nike
> "Impossible is Nothing", Adidas
> "Forever Faster" , Puma

# Tabla Comparativa
|Marca|Estilo Principal|Slogan|Precio|
|-----|--------------|------|-----|
|Nike|Deporte+Urbano|Just Do It|Alto|
|Adidas|Moda+Retro|Impossible is Nothing|Medio|
|Puma|Casual+Joven|Forever Faster|Bajo|
